video_info.title: $200/month Cursor Ultra or Claude Code Max?

qa_history.question: who is the guest?
qa_history.answer: The guest in the video is Robin, who has about 20 years of experience in the coding industry. He focuses on teaching non-technical people how to use AI systems for coding and app development. Robin shares insights about his experiences with various AI coding tools and platforms during the discussion.

qa_history.question: does he like claude code or cursor ultra better
qa_history.answer: Robin expresses a preference for both Claude Code and Cursor Ultra, depending on the context of use. He mentions that he is "always torn between Cloud Code for like maximum output" and Cursor when he wants "more of a full service suite." He acknowledges that both tools have their strengths and weaknesses, indicating that he uses them based on the specific tasks he is working on.

qa_history.question: what was my last question?
qa_history.answer: Your last question was, "does he like claude code or cursor ultra better?"
